analysis.key_quote: This rule would handicap the ability for me and my colleagues to effectively carry out our statutorily required work and undermine the accountability of the federal government by allowing for the firing of career professionals based on perceived political loyalty instead of on objective merit.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule, highlighting concerns about politicization, the integrity of the civil service, and the importance of a merit-based system. It emphasizes the potential negative impact on the effectiveness and accountability of federal employees.
